title: Even If I Wake Up and Wake Up - Novel Updates
tags: Doting Love Interests   Handsome Male Lead   Jealousy   Long-distance Relationship   Love Triangles   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Past Trauma   R-18
author: Takoyaki Taro   タコ焼き太郎
description: While having a long distance relationship between Japan and Boston, one day when Hirosaki asked me to come to a party, I reunited with Maki Kurose, a former boyfriend who had a bitter trauma in his first love.>
